fill.path: Can't flood fill on top of an existing line.
fill.nopaths: Can't flood fill without at least one closed line.

autotitle.simple: Import simple logo/cartoon image for tracing…

err.title: Error opening image file for tracing

options.manual: Place image in background for manual tracing
options.simple: Automatic trace for logos or cartoons
options.complex: Automatic trace for complex art or photos

mixed.title: Dynamic Lines/Fills
mixed.desc: Good for logos and cartoons. Bad for photos or complex art.

fills.title: Fills/shapes only
fills.desc: Better for photos and complex art. Bad for line art and cartoons.

lines.title: Lines only
lines.desc: Good for simple line/coloring book art. Bad for cartoons, photos or complex art.

export.title: Export creation for printing…
export.err: Error exporting "__file__", please report this issue with the problem project file.

settings.title: Advanced Settings
settings.resetconfirmdetail: This will revert all settings on this page to default. This cannot be undone.

gcode.title: Print Export Options
gcode.botspeedinfo: The percent of the maximum speed that the PancakeBot will move at, defaults to 70%. If this has no effect on your PancakeBot you may need to install the new firmware available on PancakeBot.com. Increasing the speed of the PancakeBot may reduce its life span.
gcode.flatteninfo: The resolution limit when converting curves into polygons for GCODE coordinates. Lower value creates more points and higher resolution, higher value creates fewer points and lower resolution approximation.
gcode.shutoffinfo: The distance of travel before the end of a line that the pump should turn off ahead of, prevents line end drip increase. Larger distance means pump will shut off sooner.
gcode.startwait: Line start pump ON wait time:
gcode.startwaitinfo: The number of milliseconds to wait before we start moving at the beggining of a line once the pump has turned on. Correct value depends on batter viscosity and pump pressure.
gcode.mirrorexportinfo: Mirror image before rendering GCODE, so pancake will appear correctly when flipped.
gcode.endwait: Line end pump OFF wait time:
gcode.endwaitinfo: The number of milliseconds to wait at the end of a line. Pump should have already shutoff early, this should ensure a clean line end. Correct value depends on batter viscosity and pump pressure.
gcode.changewaitinfo: Amount of time the bot will wait between shade/color changes. Bot will remain parked during this time to allow cooking or bottle change.
gcode.uselinefillinfo: If enabled, PancakePainter will use the diagonal line fill algorithm when creating GCODE to fill shapes, instead of the default shape fill algorithm.
gcode.fillspacinginfo: The amount of space between fill lines. Smaller values are closer together and more of them, larger values create fewer lines spaced further apart.
gcode.fillangleinfo: Angle of the automatic fill lines, defaults at 23, and be -180 to 180.
gcode.fillthreshinfo: Minimum threshold for grouping dynamic line endings together into connected groups. Large value connects more groups, 0 will ensure no groups are made.
gcode.useshortestinfo: If enabled, the shortest movement path between each point for each shade will be selected when printing. When disabled, line drawing will remain in original order drawn, favoring lines before fills.
gcode.shapefillwidthinfo: Effective width of the batter line being drawn, iterated from the edge inwards on paths to be filled. Smaller values will make more lines when filling, adding more batter. Larger values will add fewer lines and less batter, and may leave some shapes unfilled or with holes in them.
gcode.usecolorspeedinfo: If enabled, set the shade specific speeds below to allow automatic setting of a different print speed after each shade change. Disable to use only the speed at the top of settings.
